WRITING.TEXT: Thanks for the help! The tank is now doing great!

WRITING.TITLE: A few questions after a bad car ride.
WRITING.TEXT:
Recently I started a 5.5 planted tank with Fluval Shrimp Stratum. I don't have any animals because I'm still working on a fishless cycle. I made a bit of a slope on one end and I had it supported with rocks underneath the substrate. Today I had to transport the tank on a 3 hour drive. I took out about 85% of the water and I strapped it in my passenger seat. I could not have driven more carefully but my tank was not recognizable after the trip. The rocks moved around way too much and now I'm re-scaping my tank. Before the trip my water was completely clear, but after the trip it's become really bad. I've sifted the substrate with cold water multiple times now, but that only seems to make it worse.
Is there anything I can do besides capping the substrate to save it?
Is it safe to use my CO2 diffuser while the water is so dirty? https://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B004GCO35G
Will my double sponge filter help, or should I let the tank sit still?
Next time I'm going to make sure that the width of my tank is parallel to the length of my car.
Should I drain more water or less next time?
Do you guys have any other trips for transporting a small tank?
Great improvement!
DSM looks good so far. Are you planning on flooding it anytime soon?

WRITING.TITLE: [TOMT][Song] A song named after a girl with a hispanic name.
WRITING.TEXT:
I think I remember the band being indie/pop/rock.
The rest of the songs on the album were in English, but this one was in Spanish (it may have had some English). It's a long song, and it kinda sounds like two different songs put together. It may even have a pause in the middle. The name "Alejandria" comes to mind, but I haven't been able to find anything.
For some reason I remember the name being one or two letters from being another very common hispanic female first name.
I think I remember the album art being green or yellow.
https://www.reddit.com/r/Unexpected/comments/60hk18/hallo_und_herzlich_willkommen_zu_runerwartet/
I've had this happen on other phones. It's possible that there's lint in the headphone jack. I used a wooden toothpick to clear it out.
Well, I guess that's one way of reducing the amount of illegal aliens.

WRITING.TITLE: [Deal Alert] Buy 1 bootloop get any LG phone free.

WRITING.TEXT:
I haven't been having any problems with my wifi. Best wifi performance on any device I own.
http://i.imgur.com/9YJIqiZ.jpg
It sounds really cool. I'll definitely try to check it out soon!
Are you using the original V20 charger to charge it?
This acted as a fire wall to prevent fires from transferring from an adjacent building that was never built.

A lot of the titles in that subreddit are fictitious. I wanted to point out that the top specifically looks evil.
The building isn't actually evil either, of course.

I put that album together!
I'm glad you guys like it. I'm currently in love with our skyline.

I can recommend the case. It's thin enough to still be able to hold the phone comfortably, but still keeps the camera glass from sticking out. Volume buttons feel solid.
The batteries are already for sale, as opposed to what the article says. Mine should arrive any day now. https://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/B01M5C23SV/
Too bad that quick car charger was $8.00 yesterday.

Location: Kansas City, Missouri, United States
Built: 1930; 86 years ago
Architectural style: Art Deco
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kansas_City_Power_and_Light_Building

WRITING.TITLE: No one really knows what goes on at the top.

WRITING.TEXT:
I enjoyed this biography on LP Cookingham. It gives an insight of Kansas City in the late 30s early 40s.
https://www.amazon.com/gp/aw/d/087326021X/
I'm glad LG gave you no trouble in fixing the problem. Thanks for the update!

Google Fiber
http://i.imgur.com/9YJIqiZ.jpg
It's nice to have a phone that can take advantage of it.
me too thanks
Is there a reason you specify that the cable is the best "charge" cable? Would it suffer in other areas, like data transfer or video?
Me too. He just looks so happy.

WRITING.TITLE: What is this bow/tie thing at the top of the Mexican flag?

WRITING.TEXT: I would not like a long press option. When I scroll I keep my finger on the screen and it's often interpreted as a long press, interrupting what I'm reading. I switched from other reddit apps because of this. Of course, it would be no problem if the option could be disabled.
Why do you say there's no chance of it supporting Daydream?
Awesome. What's wrong with the current one? Would it be too easy for someone to take my seat?

WRITING.TITLE: What to expect with my new 29"?
WRITING.TEXT:
I went ahead and pulled the trigger on this ($20 off with coupon code Green20) unicycle: http://www.unicycle.com/unicycles/commuter-touring/trainer-29-inch-unicycle.html
I've only ever had an 18". I'll be using it mostly to ride across campus. My furthest class is 1/2 mile away. My questions are:
Will I save time over walking? Should I avoid non-paved paths? Should I lock it up outside on a bike rack while I'm in class?
Any other related tips are appreciated. Thanks.
PMing

WRITING.TEXT:

Author: Fred S. Kleiner
ISBN: 1305890388, 9781305890381
I've contacted my professor, it has to be the 15th edition.
Edit: I could also do $5.00 Amazon gift code.
At least they didn't put sugar in the fuel tanks.
It's $10/hour. I forgot to ask if you had to have a room to be able to rent the tennis courts.

There's a court on top of Crown Center. It's not a public court, but that's probably the best view you'll find.
Edit: I'd really like to play there actually. I'll call them tomorrow and report back with a price.
That would be awesome.
I've had this problem before. I wasn't able to fix it. Have you played the clean version before? Maybe it's playing the cached, clean version of the song.

WRITING.TITLE: Looking for a dashcam app with tasker capabilities.
WRITING.TEXT:
Hello.
I'd like to set up a profile to automatically start recording video when I enter my car.
I've done this before. I used Daily Roads Voyager. I don't like how clunky and ugly the app is, and it doesn't work well with tasker.
Is there another app with tasker capabilities that can record video?
This is awesome!
You can get a small discount if you have AAA.
My bad, you're right. Thanks!
Still going strong. Please put me back on the list.

You can download the different checklists [here.](http://www.firstinspires.org/resource-library/frc/2016-kit-of-parts)The password for these is
@Ahead)Together!FRC^2016
Sign me up please!
